backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries of numerous frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling page navigation and rendering localized headers and footers.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/CashC: UI panel for closing a cash register session with payment breakdown and totals.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/CashO: UI panel for opening a cash register session by entering an initial float amount.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/Closi: Displays a list of past cash register closings with totals and payment method breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/repor: Utility functions for computing payment breakdowns and filtering sales by cash session.
frontend/src/features/customers/Customer: Displays a customer's details and their filtered purchase history with totals and item breakdowns.
Provides a dialog form to create or edit a customer, handling name, phone, and submission state.
Renders a table of customers with actions to view, edit, or delete each entry.
frontend/src/features/inventory/ProductF: Offers search and category filter controls for products, updating values via callbacks.
Dialog for creating or editing a product with fields for name, category, pricing, stock, and image upload.
frontend/src/features/inventory/ProductT: Displays product rows with image, category, price, stock warnings, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/features/pos/CartPanel.tsx: Shows cart items with quantity controls, per-item subtotals, removal actions, and a total summary.
frontend/src/features/pos/cartTypes.ts: Defines cart item structures and helpers for computing subtotals, totals, and converting items to sale items.
Checkout form handling payment method selection, cash validation, change calculation, and finalizing a sale.
frontend/src/features/pos/CustomerSelect: Dropdown component for selecting or clearing an optional linked customer.
frontend/src/features/pos/payment.ts: Payment utilities including methods list, cash validation, change calculation, and label helpers.
Product search and filtering UI that lists products and allows adding them to the cart.
frontend/src/features/pos/RaffleEligibil: Displays a raffle eligibility alert when the purchase total exceeds a threshold.
frontend/src/features/pos/useCart.ts: Custom cart hook managing cart items, validation, stock checks, and total calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppStore.ts: Zustand store managing products, customers, sales, and cash sessions with persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/i18n/ptBR.ts: Provides all pt-BR localization strings and dynamic messages for the app, covering navigation, inventory, POS, customers, and cash register.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus global styles and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CashRegisterPage.tsx: Implements the cash register UI, enabling opening/closing sessions and showing closing history.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Manages customer CRUD, viewing details, and prevents deletion when purchase history exists.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with navigation cards for inventory, POS, customers, and cash register.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Handles product CRUD with search and category filtering, rendering product lists and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/PosPage.tsx: Implements the POS workflow including cart handling, checkout, customer selection, and sale completion.
frontend/src/storage/localStorageStore.t: Loads, saves, and clears app state in localStorage with versioning and default-state fallback.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines domain types for products, customers, sales, cash sessions, and overall app state.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Provides a function to validate image files under 500KB and convert them to base64 using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats numbers as BRL currency and parses currency strings back into numeric values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended color system, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including summary, architecture notes, features, and versioning state for the SPA mini-market app.
